definitions: the quality or state of giving out or reflecting light

examples.text: we can change the brightness of the bulb

shortDefinitions: quality or state of giving out or reflecting light

definitions: the quality or state of being well lit

examples.text: his mother called to him from the brightness of the kitchen

shortDefinitions: quality or state of being well lit

examples.text: the brightness will linger through Wednesday
the brightness of a winter's day

definitions: the quality of being vividly and boldly colored

examples.text: he adds brightness to the dishes by tossing in fresh herbs

shortDefinitions: quality of being vividly and boldly coloured

definitions: the quality of being intelligent and quick-witted

examples.text: he reminded me of my first son with his brightness and inquisitiveness

shortDefinitions: quality of being intelligent and quick-witted

definitions: the quality of being cheerful or lively

examples.text: there's so much light and brightness in their faces

shortDefinitions: quality of being cheerful or lively

examples.text: there had been some brightness in her life

definitions: the quality in sound of being clear, vibrant, and typically high-pitched

examples.text: tone alters the brightness of the sound

shortDefinitions: quality in sound of being clear high-pitched
